biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Joanne Gignilliat Trimmier Woodward (born February 27, 1930) is an American actress, television and theatrical producer, and widow of Paul Newman. She is perhaps best-known for her Academy Award winning role in The Three Faces of Eve (1958).

name: Joanne Woodward
